entities.description: Section addressing depression in adolescents, including feelings of sadness, emptiness, and loss of interest.
Feelings of sadness, emptiness, or depression lasting several days or longer.
Feelings of being discouraged or hopeless about life during periods of sadness or depression.
Loss of interest and becoming bored with most things usually enjoyed.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent has experienced feelings of sadness, emptiness, or depression for an extended period.
Indicates the respondent has experienced feelings of discouragement or hopelessness during periods of extended sadness or depression.
Indicates the respondent has experienced a loss of interest or boredom in activities usually enjoyed.
